data.name: Don't Die: Survival
data.detailed_description:
[This game is developing by only one student.]
[Sorry for the mistakes, i will fix it as soon as i can.]
Your only aim is to survive.

To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat. Protect yourself from other players, and kill them for meat. Explore the true survival world and take part in the development of the full game.
data.about_the_game:
[This game is developing by only one student.]
[Sorry for the mistakes, i will fix it as soon as i can.]
Your only aim is to survive.

To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat. Protect yourself from other players, and kill them for meat. Explore the true survival world and take part in the development of the full game.
data.short_description:
Which one do you wanna be. If you wanna stay alive then kill your enemies!
Explore the true survival world and take part in the development of the full game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32 Or 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GTS 450 / ATI® 5870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 32 Or 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: 3 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
